{{Wireless embedded system |brand=TP-LINK |model=Archer CR700 |revision=v1.x |asin=B012I96J3W |newegg=N82E16833704255 |fcc_date=10/31/2014 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Proware |type=wireless router, cable modem |fcc_id=TE7CR700V1 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM33843 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=256 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4360 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4331 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53124S;BCM53124SKMMLG, TE1409 P20, 360372 3 W; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |flags=DOCSIS 3.0 |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=TP-LINK_2.4GHZ_XXXXXX, TP-LINK_5GHZ_XXXXXX |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin }}
:• '''1300Mbps''' - 3SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''450Mbps''' - 3SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''1750 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1750 Wireless Dual Band DOCSIS 3.0 Cable Modem Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.tp-link.com/us/products/details/Archer-CR700.html}}{{SupportPage|vendor=TP-LINK|model=Archer-CR700_V1}} "14021322580-1.0 Rev:1.0sp5" is silkscreened :on the board in the FCC photos. *Web GUI: http://tplinkmodem.net DOCSIS 3.0 16x4{{CableModemSpec |down_c=16 |up_c=4 }} *CPU: [[Broadcom]] [https://www.broadcom.com/products/broadband/cable/modems/bcm33843 BCM33843] - ''DOCSIS 3.0 Cable Gateway Gigabit SoC'' ===Reviews=== *[http://www.tomshardware.com/news/tp-link-cable-modem-router-tc-7610-cr700,30025.html ''TP-LINK TC-7610/CR700'' on '''TomsHardWare'''] :[[TP-LINK Archer CR700]] - ''AC1750 Wireless DOCSIS 3.0 Cable Modem Router'' :Dual-core CPU, Flash: 16MB, RAM: 256MB, 6x int. antennas, radio amplifiers. :7x LED indicators, 4x LAN ports, 2x USB ports, has ports for a coaxial cable.
